LOGIN



































We Improve People's Lives








Cranes

Whether you’re lifting 50 lbs or 40 ton, Gorbel® Workstation crane, gantry, Jib Crane and Cleveland Tramrail® systems are the material handling products you need to protect your people, your productivity, and your profits. Whatever industry you’re in, we’ve got the crane solution you need to get it done better, safer, and faster.

[ CLICK TO ENTER ]









Ergonomic Lifting
No crane is complete without an Ergonomic Lifting solution.
Our GS Series Electric Chain Hoists, in capacities from 1/8 ton to 5 ton, are the perfect complement to your Gorbel® or Cleveland Tramrail® crane. 
Need a more programmability and integration? Our G-Force® and Easy Arm® Intelligent Lifting Devices enable your workers to lift and maneuver loads safely, and provide a combination of pinpoint precision and blazing speeds most traditional lifting devices can’t offer. 
[ CLICK TO ENTER ]









Fall Protection

Are your workers unprotected? OSHA Requires engineered fall protection for all workers working at elevations of four feet or more. Our Tether Track™ Overhead Fall Protection prevents falls to lower levels without sacrificing your workers’ freedom or mobility. Need a more versatile solution? Our Ranger Mobile Anchor and Road Ranger Mobile Anchor are ideal for fall arrest on the go.

[ CLICK TO ENTER ]






NEW






Warehouse Solutions

Whether your needs call for efficiently loading or unloading floor-loaded product in containers, our Warehouse Solutions offer a variety of options. The Destuff-it™ line of portable ergonomic conveyor systems allow workers to transfer boxes and related items safely and efficiently. Whether moving standard small boxes weighing just a few pounds or large, unevenly shaped materials, Destuff-it enhances throughput while minimizing worker fatigue and muscle strain.

[ CLICK TO ENTER ]









ShopCrane

Is your love for racing and restoration becoming a pain in your back? Shop Crane can help with the heavy lifting! Shop Crane is an overhead crane system that gives you complete coverage within the frame of the system. This affordable lifting solution is ideal for your residential garage or work shop. Great for vehicle restoration, maintenance on farm or golf course equipment, or getting your car, ATV, snowmobile or any motor drive vehicle ready for action.

[ CLICK TO ENTER ]









CRANES









Whether you're lifting 50 lbs. or 40 ton,
Gorbel floor and ceiling mounted cranes keep
you moving. Our Work Station and Jib Crane
solutions offer numerous ergonomic benefits,
and our Cleveland Tramrail® Patented Track line
continues to be the benchmark by which all other
heavy duty cranes are measured.


So, whatever industry you're in, we've got the
crane solution you need to get it done better,
faster, safer.

[ CLICK TO ENTER ]






 




ERGONOMIC LIFTING









Gorbel’s G-Force® and Easy Arm®
Intelligent Lifting Devices fill the void between traditional
lifting devices and completely automated robotic
solutions, while reducing strain on workers. They
enable operators to lift and maneuver loads naturally,
as if the devices were an extension of their arms,
and provide a combination of pinpoint precision and
blazing speeds that hoists and air balancers simply
can't offer.


Looking for a more traditional lifting solution? Our
Gorbel Electric Chain Hoists, in capacities from 1/8
ton to 5 ton, are the perfect complement to your Gorbel®or Cleveland Tramrail® crane.

[ CLICK TO ENTER ]






 




FALL PROTECTION









Are your workers unprotected? OSHA requires engineered
fall protection for all workers working at elevations
of four feet or more. Gorbel® has the solution!


Our Tether Track™ Overhead Fall Protection provides
workers with a high degree of mobility and freedom,
while preventing falls to lower levels. Our Ranger
Mobile Anchor and Road Ranger Mobile Anchor are ideal
for fall arrest on the go.

[ CLICK TO ENTER ]






 




WAREHOUSE SOLUTIONS









Whether your needs call for efficiently loading or unloading floor-loaded product in containers, our Warehouse Solutions offer a variety of options. The Destuff-it™ line of portable ergonomic conveyor systems allow workers to transfer boxes and related items safely and efficiently. Whether moving standard small boxes weighing just a few pounds or large, unevenly shaped materials, Destuff-it enhances throughput while minimizing worker fatigue and muscle strain

[ CLICK TO ENTER ]






 




SHOPCRANE









Is your love for racing and restoration becoming a pain
in your back? Shop Crane can help with the heavy lifting!
Shop Crane is a non-industrial overhead bridge crane system
that uses two parallel steel tracks, or runways, to guide a
steel bridge over your work space. The bridge features a
non-binding trolley that glides along the inside of the
enclosed track to give you complete coverage within the
frame of the system.


Shop Crane is a type of lifting system that can be used in
a residential garage or work shop. Great for vehicle
restoration, maintenance on farm or golf course equipment,
or getting your car, ATV, or snowmobile or any motor
driven vehicle ready for action.

[ CLICK TO ENTER ]
